item.description: What kind of music do you like? I keep moving from platfrom to the other Spotify 🎸 What kind of music are you into?

item.title: Who dis?
item.description: Hello, Rhitik here! 👋🏼 First things first, I use avatars for identity. Let me put a face to the name. Here is Rhitik, with Hritik Roshan,
